localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Use iPNOTE intellectual management platform and marketplace to get trademarks and patents, while saving up to 90% of your legal budget!
nodes.title: iPNOTE - Protect your startupâ€™s intellectual property, save up to 90%
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: e-gree is a new mobile app that allows you to create customized legal contracts for your business and everyday needs. With over 20 different contract templates for everything from NDAs to Prenups to Freelance work agreements, e-gree makes legal services accessible and affordable.
nodes.title: e-gree - Ğccessible, quick, and safe legal contracts for all needs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: The Founder's Handshake and Prenup formalize the work relationship between two (potential) Co-Founders. Remove all legal uncertainty when testing it if you vibe together while building a company.
nodes.title: Founder's Handshake & Prenup - Simple Agreements for Co-founder Alignment! SACA?
nodes.author: Johannes Benjamin

nodes.excerpt: LLC Toolkit is a straightforward company formation with zero overhead + zero service fees! Our team has 15+ years helping other companies succeeded! #buildinpublic Follow our journey for more perks! ğŸ
nodes.title: LLC Toolkit - Register Delaware LLC with zero fees
nodes.author: Eugene Hauptmann

nodes.excerpt: Kodex is the easiest way for companies to process, and respond to, information requests from governments and law enforcement all around the world. The most common requests include preservation holds & subpoenas for user data from agencies like the FBI.
nodes.title: Kodex - The easiest way to process data requests from governments
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: An app that lets you ask a lawyer a question for just $40. Only in Florida (for now). New markets coming soon!
nodes.title: lawzy - Quick access to legal advice from lawyers
nodes.author: Jillian Baronoff

nodes.excerpt: Accord is a web app that helps startups create, edit and sign legal documents. Start with our free templates, including NDAs, LOIs, MOUs, Privacy Policies, Pilot Agreements and more.
nodes.title: Accord - Generate and sign legal documents for your startup
nodes.author: Min-Kyu Jung

nodes.excerpt: GDPR Unpack is an all-in-one Notion workspace to help you easily comply with the European Data Protection Regulation
nodes.title: GDPR Unpack - GDPR made simple for small businesses
nodes.author: Antoine Milkoff

nodes.excerpt: With these design patterns by Juro and Stefania Passera, you can turn boring legal text into a transparent, engaging document that people can actually read.
nodes.title: Privacy Policy Template by Juro - Get a privacy policy people can actually read
nodes.author: Christoph Janz

nodes.excerpt: Want to immigrate to Canada? Visto Qualify is a free tool that will check your eligibility for more than 65 Canadian immigration programs in minutes. Built by Canadian immigration lawyers, itâ€™s the quickest way to get started on your immigration journey!
nodes.title: Visto Qualify - Find the best immigration pathway to Canada for free
nodes.author: Josh Schachnow

nodes.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
nodes.title: Sleegal - Find the right lawyers instantly - free for all to use
nodes.author: Gloria Qiao

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
nodes.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: â—‹ designation of a DPO at your company; â—‹ 2 requests from your users; â—‹ 2 30-min consultations; â—‹ a tailored GDPR roadmap; â—‹ 3 document templates.
nodes.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service
nodes.author: Margarita Sivakova

nodes.excerpt: Need compliance solutions, but donâ€™t want to spend thousands in legal fees? Termlyâ€™s compliance suite can help you stay up to date and compliant with privacy laws like the GDPR, CCPA, ePrivacy Regulation, and more â€” for FREE.
nodes.title: Termly.io - GDPR Compliance Solution for Small Business
nodes.author: Nolan Clemmons

nodes.excerpt: Hire anyone in LATAM legally in seconds. We enable HR teams to easily manage paperwork, compliance and payments for distributed teams all over LATAM.
nodes.title: Ontop - Multi-country payroll manager for LATAM
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: LLC. EIN. ITIN. US Address & Bank Account. US Payments. Free Tax Consultation. IRS Tax Filings. Bookkeeping. Website. Phone Number with a Utility Bill. $50,000 in Startup Perks. And More. Launch your LLC from anywhere as a US or Non-US resident in 2 minutes.
nodes.title: StartPack - One-stop-shop for US and non-US residents to launch a US LLC

nodes.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
nodes.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
nodes.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes
nodes.author: Ayoub Moustaid
